definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: What do you think about mixed marriages?
sentences.chinese: 你對異族通婚是怎麼看的？

sentences.english: Although these different clans are strong, can truely of real strenght but haven't scooped out completely, if.
sentences.chinese: 這些異族雖強，可真正的實力卻還未挖掘完全，若。

sentences.english: At the time, interracial marriages were illegal in certain states.
sentences.chinese: 那時候，異族通婚在有些州屬於非法行爲。

sentences.english: The Sarlacc has been a puzzle to xenobiologists for years.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，對異族生物學家來說，沙拉克一直是個謎。

sentences.english: The alien being was realized as a computer-generated character.
sentences.chinese: 這個異族人是計算機生成的角色。

sentences.english: Jango had used an exotic weapon, a Kamino saberdart, to eliminate Zam.
sentences.chinese: 詹戈使用異族武器卡米諾劍鏢殺死了贊姆。

sentences.english: As the world is becoming smaller, the number of interracial couples is growing, especially in countries with large numbers of immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 世界變得愈小，異族婚姻的隨之增多，是移民衆多的。

sentences.english: Alien cultures have developed their own native analogs of deflector shield technology.
sentences.chinese: 異族文明研發了他們本土類似的偏導護盾技術。

sentences.english: Ket were originally divided into two exogamous phratries which exchanged marriage partners.
sentences.chinese: 印八偈人原本分爲兩個交換配偶的異族通婚的氏族。

sentences.english: The Imbat Ket were originally divided into two exogamous phratries which exchanged marriage partners.
sentences.chinese: 印八偈人原本分爲兩個交換配偶的異族通婚的氏族。

sentences.english: Do you think interracial marriages may have fish-out-of-water problems?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲異族通婚，會有格格不入的問題嗎？

definition: to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
to engage in wars of aggression at will (idiom)/militaristic/bellicose
the country ruined and the people starving (idiom)
destitute and homeless (idiom); forced from one's home and wandering about/displaced
